name: Ballast (2ecat)
description:
What Is It?

Ballast is a short 3D horror game created in 48 hours for the Champlain College Creator Jam. Play as Meg, a marine biologist researching the biggest deep sea discovery of her life, as she struggles to regain control of her malfunctioning sub. Stealthily make your away around to collect the needed parts, but be careful not to step in the light or something outside might see you! 

Who Made It?

The Ballast development team consisted of 10 Champlain juniors-- including three artists, two programmers, two production assistants, a level designer, a sound designer, and a voice actor--  over the course of one weekend.  The CC Creator Jam theme was Shadow.
